meta.content: Website for Stephenson Area Public Schools

a.span: MI School Data Visit Our Dashboard

div.h1: Welcome to Stephenson Area Public Schools
div.p: Mission Statement Stephenson Area Public Schools provides a safe environment to educate, challenge and inspire all students to be life-long responsible learners.
We will update this area with new information as it becomes available.

We realize that as you navigate this new learning environment you may find you need to change from internet to paper or paper to internet. If there is a change in how you wish to receive instructional materials, please either call or email the SES office or the SHS/SMS office. SES office email: dpanske@stephenson.k12.mi.us. SMS/SHS office email: mcross@stephenson.k12.mi.us.
Have you students check their emails for a google form requesting information from them. Once we have the information, Mrs. Grille will be contacting students to plan classes for next year.

a.strong: Dual Enrollment / Early Middle College / CTE Comparison

div.p: Stephenson Area Public Schools is looking to fill 2 coaching positions. Please click on the link for information and a printable application.
Stephenson Area Public Schools has 2 Sinking Fund jobs available for bid. Please click on the link for information.

Scheduling tools has been posted on the high school page to aid students in selecting classes for next year. The section includes the course catalog, credit audit, and 5 year plan paperwork. Students in grades 8-10 should please check their emails for updates and surveys for scheduling.
Stephenson BPA would like to area individuals and businesses that donated items for the spring raffle. This raffle will be held in the fall. We appreciate your support of our BPA program.

p.a: Registration information for the 2020-21 school year
